<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">f123045bdad22110ab69a01767f4705d</macroponent><name>stylized_text_5/text</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  if(api.data.look_up_record_1.total_score.value > 80){
    return 'Excellent! Your customers are engaged and very happy with your brand.';
  }
  else if (api.data.look_up_record_1.total_score.value > 50){
    return 'Good. Your customers would have likely interacted with your brand';
  }
  else if (api.data.look_up_record_1.total_score.value > 25){
    return 'Needs Improvement. You may need to change your tactics to ensure that customers will interact with your brand.';
  }
  else{
    return 'You may want to restrategize on how you will market your brand in various Social Media Platforms.'
  }
	return '';
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>julius.balgos</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-28 11:39:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>4f62b8e06d2a21107f448352635896c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_5/text</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Appathon App" source="x_snc_appathon_app">ba76ff4ba59221107f44741f381ec215</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Appathon App">ba76ff4ba59221107f44741f381ec215</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4f62b8e06d2a21107f448352635896c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>julius.balgos</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-28 11:39:37</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
